title: Enhancing Hospitality Practice Competencies: Project for Developing Vision Protection Strategies in Children’s Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Visual physiology, basic understanding of digital learning environments, and foundational research methodology
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can calculate optimal font size and viewing duration across various display types (PC/tablet/smartphone/E-ink).
Learners can design a vision-protective digital learning environment based on experimental data.
Learners can propose educational content guidelines applying pixel density (PPD ≥ 60) and viewing distance (≥ 33 cm) standards.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
